author: ThioJoe
description:
You can actually keep using it for another year. 

Windows 10 has officially reached end of support. But that doesn't really tell the whole story. Microsoft will still keep producing security updates for a while which they call "Extended Security Updates", and regular users can get them for the next year for free. In this video I walk through how to do so, it's really easy.

▼ Time Stamps: ▼
0:00 - Intro
0:18 - What To Do
1:16 - After Enrolling
1:55 - Some More Notes

title: Windows 10 Is Not Dead - How to Get 1 Year of Extended Updates
